question: Paytm Payments Bank claims that it now has over ________ KYC-registered wallets.
explanation: Paytm Payments Bank claims that it now has over 100 million KYC-registered wallets - which includes both complete & minimum KYC. This development comes even as there have been indications in digital payments industry of a sharp fall in mobile-wallet users as customer authentication did not take off. Paytm Payments Bank is owned 51% by Paytm founder Vijay Sharma & 49% by One97 Communications.
